channel.title: business-life on Jiten Agarwal
channel.description: Recent content in business-life on Jiten Agarwal

item.title: From Programmer to Businessman
item.description: This post is the first of many posts to follow describing my journey from a programmer to a businessman. I have been a programmer for 10 years now, and recently I decided to join my family’s business full-time. I saw that transition coming at some point and I always envisioned myself how I will handle this transition. My current role in our business is to make it tech-enabled for smoother and human error-free operations.
